name: Mad Football. Mechanical league.
description:
Take control of one of the robots in the football championship. Wins in Career mode to unlock new models of robots.
Plug in a gamepad and play with friends in cooperative mode or in versus mode.

Features:
- company mode (up to 2 players);
- pvp mode (up to 4 players);
- keyboard and gamepad support (gamepads are recommended).

Gamepad controls:
Shot - X
Pass - Y
Skill - B
Jump - A
Pause - Start

Keyboard controls:
Shot - Z
Pass - X
Skill - C
Jump - Space
Pause - Esc
